definitions.definition: A chair mounted on large wheels for the transportation or use of a sick or disabled person.
Designed for use by wheelchairbound people.
Any device involving wheels designed to assist a non-human animal with locomotion .

main_definition: A chair mounted on large wheels for the transportation or use of a sick or disabled person.
secondary_definitions: ( attributive ) Designed for use by wheelchairbound people.
( by extension ) Any device involving wheels designed to assist a non-human animal with locomotion .
